title: I can't post on standard forums.
body:
Hi, 

I leveled my account to level 6 which is the requirement to post comments and create a discussion.

However the boards still sees my account as a Level 1 account rather than a Level 6 one.

Please help. It's been two days now.

replies.body: Are you the coach for LFT?
As Wuks confirmed, it looks like your account just needed to sync with the boards!  Sometimes a post will force that update.  Let me know if you have any issues posting!
It should be updated now! Let me know if you encounter any further issues :)
